data.name: Jalopy - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
All the tracks you love in crisp high quality audio! Listen to such classics as 'Dunaújváros Daytripping', 'Plazhen Tants' - and who could forget the bouncy anthem celebrating the Laika Automobile, 'Meinen Laika'? No longer are you restrained to the Laika 601 Deluxe's sub-par stereo system (it is a Jalopy, after all). Nod your head, shake that booty and jam to the tasty tunes of Jalopy's Official Soundtrack.

01 Meinen Laika
02 Lange Reise
03 Dresdner Automobilclub
04 Harmonikatalas
05 Krugovi
06 Dunaújváros Daytripping
07 Let's Go For A Drive
07 Plazhen Tants
09 Kalkan
10 Balkan Girl I Love You!
11 Yuva Hatıraları
12 Anthem Zu Lieben

Music Written, Produced, Recorded and Mixed by Jeremy Warmsley.
www.jeremywarmsley.com

(The Jalopy Official Soundtrack has removed the audio effect applied to the songs in game which replicates the Laika speakers. This soundtrack contains clear high quality audio for your listening pleasure!)

fullgame.name: Jalopy - The Road Trip Driving Indie Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1GB memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
